title: RealtimeAlert
description: An alert raised by a realtime monitoring or streaming system.

windowId.description: Identifier of the feature window that triggered this alert.

alertType.description: Type or category of alert (e.g., threshold, anomaly, missing-data).

severity.description: Severity level of the alert (e.g., INFO, WARNING, CRITICAL).

detectedAt.description: Timestamp when the alert was detected.

context.description: Additional domain-specific context about this alert.
